links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

wikitext.*:
'''Emilíana Torrini''' ([[16 May|May 16]], [[1977]]) performed "[[Gollum's Song]]" for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. [[Fran Walsh]] wrote the lyrics while [[Howard Shore]] directed the music.

==Awards==
* [[2003]] - '''[http://cinemaclips.com/PFCS PFCS Award]''', Best Original Song, "Gollum's Song"<ref group="note">Technically, Torrini did not win this award; it went to Walsh and Shore.</ref>
